mapper.insert: insert into adminInfo(id, rid, name, pwd, telephone, email, status, photo) values( seq_adminInfo.NEXTVAL, #{admin.rid}, #{admin.name}, #{admin.pwd}, #{admin.telephone}, #{admin.email}, 0, #{admin.photo} )
mapper.select: select * from adminInfo a where a.name = #{admin.aname} and a.pwd = {admin.pwd} and a.rid = {admin.rid}
